languages.text: {n}Вздрогнув от ужаса, мужчина роняет свое огнестрельное недоразумение и валится на колени. На его физиономии возникает плаксивое выражение.{/n} "Да как же энто! Пощадите! Не призна-а-ал!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вздрогнув от ужаса, мужчина роняет свое огнестрельное недоразумение и валится на колени. На его физиономии возникает плаксивое выражение.{/n} "Да как же энто! Пощадите! Не призна-а-ал!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вздрогнув от ужаса, мужчина роняет свое огнестрельное недоразумение и валится на колени. На его физиономии возникает плаксивое выражение.{/n} "Да как же энто! Пощадите! Не призна-а-ал!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy-y-y! Didn't recognise ya!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人吓得退了好几步，他赶紧扔掉了手中的枪，跪倒在地，一把鼻涕一把泪。{/n}“黄金王座在上啊！大人，求、求你饶了我吧！我可没认出你来啊！”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人吓得退了好几步，他赶紧扔掉了手中的枪，跪倒在地，一把鼻涕一把泪。{/n}“黄金王座在上啊！大人，求、求你饶了我吧！我可没认出你来啊！”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人は恐れから戸惑い、銃を落とし、不機嫌な顔で膝から崩れ落ちた。{/n}「ああ、なんという！陛下、ご、ご、ご慈悲を！気が付きませんでした！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は恐れから戸惑い、銃を落とし、不機嫌な顔で膝から崩れ落ちた。{/n}「ああ、なんという！陛下、ご、ご、ご慈悲を！気が付きませんでした！」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}El anciano, aterrado, da un paso atrás, tira su espantosa arma y cae de rodillas, suplicando.{/n} «¡Por el Trono! ¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, te-tenga pi-piedad! ¡No le había reconocido!».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano, aterrado, da un paso atrás, tira su espantosa arma y cae de rodillas, suplicando.{/n} «¡Por el Trono! ¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, te-tenga pi-piedad! ¡No le había reconocido!».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann zuckt vor Angst zusammen, lässt seine Farce von Schusswaffe fallen und fällt mit einer weinerlichen Grimasse auf die Knie.{/n} "Allmächtiger Thron! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ha-habt Erbarmen! Ich hab Euch nicht erkannt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann zuckt vor Angst zusammen, lässt seine Farce von Schusswaffe fallen und fällt mit einer weinerlichen Grimasse auf die Knie.{/n} "Allmächtiger Thron! Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ha-habt Erbarmen! Ich hab Euch nicht erkannt!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme tressaille, visiblement terrorisé, et lâche son arme de fortune avant de tomber à genoux en pleurnichant.{/n} « Par le Trône ! Votre Seigneurie, ayez pitié ! Je vous avais pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme tressaille, visiblement terrorisé, et lâche son arme de fortune avant de tomber à genoux en pleurnichant.{/n} « Par le Trône ! Votre Seigneurie, ayez pitié ! Je vous avais pas {mf|reconnu|reconnue} ! »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar dehşetle irkiliyor. Derme çatma silahını düşürüp ağlamaklı bir ifadeyle dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Taht adına! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, acıyın banaaa! Tanıyamadım efendim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man flinches in terror, drops his travesty of a firearm, and falls on his knees with a snivelling grimace.{/n} "Throne above! Yer {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercyyy! Didn't recognise ya!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İhtiyar dehşetle irkiliyor. Derme çatma silahını düşürüp ağlamaklı bir ifadeyle dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Taht adına! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, acıyın banaaa! Tanıyamadım efendim!"
traits.speaker: OldMan
